about_the_game:
You are trapped. Trapped in a morgue, unwillingly running tests with four beings looking to slaughter you. Equipped with your laptop and analysis tool, you must survive until the prototype test ends, precisely 6 minutes and 6 seconds.

Your only tools for survival are your laptop and analysis tool. The laptop serves as your lifeline, providing access to cameras strategically placed throughout the morgue. You can monitor the movements of the entities and view their sanity and stress levels using the analysis tool. However, using the laptop drains its battery, forcing you to balance between keeping an eye on your surroundings and collecting energy cells throughout the test room.

As time passes, the weight of your situation presses upon you. The oppressive feeling of being watched is unrelenting, as the phantoms hunt you down. You can almost feel their eyes on you, their presence manifesting as an unshakable sense of dread.

You are trapped. Trapped in a morgue, unwillingly running tests with four beings looking to slaughter you. Equipped with your laptop and analysis tool, you must survive until the prototype test ends, precisely 6 minutes and 6 seconds.

Your only tools for survival are your laptop and analysis tool. The laptop serves as your lifeline, providing access to cameras strategically placed throughout the morgue. You can monitor the movements of the entities and view their sanity and stress levels using the analysis tool. However, using the laptop drains its battery, forcing you to balance between keeping an eye on your surroundings and collecting energy cells throughout the test room.

As time passes, the weight of your situation presses upon you. The oppressive feeling of being watched is unrelenting, as the phantoms hunt you down. You can almost feel their eyes on you, their presence manifesting as an unshakable sense of dread.

  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 Capabilities
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: You are trapped. Trapped in a morgue, unwillingly running tests with four beings looking to slaughter you. Equipped with your laptop and analysis tool, you must survive until the prototype test ends, precisely 6 minutes and 6 seconds. Good Luck.
